alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:49AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total combined sleet and snow accumulations of up to one half inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Custer, Blaine and Beckham Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7.
